input.sentences: i never thought loving some one was so great
until i met the love of my life dan
he took me all around the world
and still to the day semms to amaze me more than i think
output.sentences: The two people sitting by the wall seemed very loving.
They seemed comfortable with each other.
They asked me to take a photo of them.
As I clicked the photo the man asked the lady to marry him.
It was a perfect moment, in the perfect place and I took another picture, gave them the camera and walked away.
